onboarding-details:
We need to set and confirm the city where you want to do the inventory.
You are one step closer to getting your GPC emissions inventory!
setup-details: Please select the city and year for which you want to create your emissions inventory
gpc-basic-message: Only GPC Basic Inventories are supported momentarily
confirm-details:
Review and confirm this information about your city. If there is an error please send us an email to edit it.

We use <1>open data sources to pre-fill the city profile.
done-heading:
Your City Inventory Profile
Was Successfully Created
done-details:
You created your city profile to start your GPC Basic GHG inventory.
Also, we found for your city 10+ external datasets that you can connect to complete your inventory.
